member.name: ID2D1PathGeometry.GetFigureCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of figures in the path geometry.
member.param: A pointer that receives the number of figures in the path geometry when this method returns. You must allocate storage for this parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1PathGeometry.GetSegmentCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of segments in the path geometry.
member.param: A pointer that receives the number of segments in the path geometry when this method returns. You must allocate storage for this parameter.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1PathGeometry.Open
member.summary: Retrieves the geometry sink that is used to populate the path geometry with figures and segments.
member.param: When this method returns, geometrySink contains the address of a pointer to the geometry sink that is used to populate the path geometry with figures and segments. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1PathGeometry.Stream
member.summary: Copies the contents of the path geometry to the specified .
member.param: The sink to which the path geometry's contents are copied. Modifying this sink does not change the contents of this path geometry.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1PathGeometry
member.summary: Represents a complex shape that may be composed of arcs, curves, and lines.
